summary:
Stand out from all of those bandit chief thugs with a new creatable, gilded Nordic carved armor! 

Now with a new and improved Scalemail version!
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]4qLlMbwjEDg[/youtube]

Special thanks to Hodilton for taking the time to make this video.


version 1.0
Published by ViperMkII

This mod adds a unique and creatable gilded version of the Nordic carved armor, it requires that you have the Dragonborn DLC. To craft this new armor, go to a forge and you will find it under the Nordric category. Each piece of gilded armor requires you to have a corresponding piece of Nordic armor and a gold ingot to craft (cuirass requires two ingots).

It is male, female and as race compatible as the original. 

Feedback is welcome!


If you like this, checkout my other mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24593]\"Ancestral Helms\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32070]\"Blued Steel Plate Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32072]\"Gilded Steel Plate Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31796]\"Steel Armor Tweaks\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31803]\"Nordic Carved Armor Tweaks\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33772]\"Imperial Legion Reborn\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34040]\"Hero of the Legion\"[/url]
